name: Rose Black Tea
altText: Rose black tea with aromatic rose petals and a rich, smooth flavor.
reference: Teas N You. (2020). White rose [Photograph]. Teas N You. https://teasnyou.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/whiterose.jpg

name: Lavender Earl Grey
altText: Lavender Earl Grey tea with a fragrant lavender aroma and a classic bergamot taste.

name: Jasmine Green Tea
altText: Jasmine green tea with a delicate floral aroma and a light, refreshing taste.

name: Vanilla Oolong Tea
altText: Vanilla oolong tea with a creamy vanilla flavor and a smooth, velvety finish.

name: Chamomile Honey Tea
altText: Chamomile honey tea with a soothing blend of chamomile flowers and sweet honey.
